A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A person who just said his 10 year old son said the movie \"doesn't make sense\" saw through all the flash and excitement that was on the screen. He also said the critics must have been paid off by Disney. Actually I see it as Disney is the new juggernaut that can ruin a critics livelihood if he or she doesn't buy into what they want them to portray. Say the wrong thing and you will be an outcast and not have access to Disney.
